reasoning: Craniosynostosis 3 is a rare genetic form. Total craniosynostosis incidence 1-3 per 10,000 live births (~1-3 per 100k). CRAN3 (specific genetic type) represents subset, estimated 2-3% of all cases, ~2.5 per 100k overall.
source: Heuzé Y et al. (2014). Unraveling the genetics of human cranial vault development. Nat Commun. 5:3951
